biotools.summary: This program performs rapid in silico genotyping for selected loci (e.g. phylogenetic SNPs, drug resistance mutations) in bacterial genome sequences in FastQ format. Mapping to a whole-genome reference sequence or de novo assembly or the short reads is not necessary.

bioschemas.name: KvarQ
bioschemas.summary: This program performs rapid in silico genotyping for selected loci (e.g. phylogenetic SNPs, drug resistance mutations) in bacterial genome sequences in FastQ format. Mapping to a whole-genome reference sequence or de novo assembly or the short reads is not necessary.
